basic.blooming: Flowering period May-June, fruiting period September
basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color yellow green

maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Apply 1-2 times monthly in spring, timly top-dressing after flowering for fruiting
maintenance.pruning: Remove weak, overlapping, over-crowd, and diseased or insect-infested branches timely
